description:
My humble abode is my pride and joy and I'm so thankful to share with guests. I have a 2 bedroom with a queen size bed in one room and a twin in the other. I welcome responsible individuals that will respect my space like it was your own!!!

Newly renovated 2 bedroom....

3 blocks from the subway will take you 15-20 minutes to Times Square and a few more stops won the same line will take you to Chelsea, Greenwich Village, Soho and Ground Zero.

The area is very historical with incredible architects rural landmarks in Harlem. It is located near Sylvia's Restaurant, Red Roosters, and Corner Social for dining.

Everything

Think of me as your concierge. I'll answer any questions you have about the area during your trip. Ask me any time! I'll do my best to help.

Location, location, location

4 blocks north 2, 3 express train
Bus stop right in front of apartment
name: My 2 br. Humble Abode
review: Loren was very accomodating and helped to find an alternative solution for key pick up/drop off on very short notice. Her apartment was as described. We had a comfortable stay.
